entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as having a book published with his name on it.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who brings him a copy of his book and mentions that she asked her dad to send it to him.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Ron's brothers, mentioned as sitting at the Gryffindor table with Luna.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is present when Luna brings him a copy of his book.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is present when Luna brings him a copy of his book and starts reading letters from readers.

relationships.description: Luna gives Harry a copy of his book.
Harry and Hermione share letters from readers.
Ron reads a letter to Harry.
